name: Quttera
tag_list: web-security, web-malware-detection, software-vulnerability-exploits-detection, website-protection, website-anti-malware-protection, website-monitoring, url-scanner, domain-security-scanner
overview:
Quttera offers SaaS based malware detection solutions. Multi-layered technology for malware identification using non-signature based methods. Its Malware Scanner API is unique, because no-one offers the same in the market. Best fits multi-sites owners, OEM based security, Ad Networks, hosting companies and cloud companies.

Other products: desktop utilities, CMS plugins, CLI-based website scanner and free online services to detect malware and suspicious content on websites and remote URLs.

Using any of Quttera’s products helps in detecting and identifying the potentially malicious/suspicious code on web pages. The security report is very handy in understanding what is behind the legitimate code on the web page and whether or not it can be dangerous to access it.

All products are based on Quttera’s ‘malicious content detection engine’ that is being improved on a regular basis and stays up to date to outsmart the diversity of web based attacks.

Its web security advantage is the non signature based technology as opposed to traditional anti-virus solutions.

The users are AdNetworks, multi-sites owners, webmasters and regular internet visitors that do not manage their own website/s.

milestones.description: Partnership with virustotal.com. Quttera provides domain/website scanning dataset for virustotal service.
